    <tei-facsimile data-origname="facsimile">
        <tei-surface data-origname="surface">
            <tei-graphic url="mdp.39015082311062-seq_915.tif" width="2484" height="3744" data-origname="graphic" data-origatts="height width url" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2126,2288 2142,2410 2117,2435 1962,2439 608,2439 615,2429 590,2371 680,2346 732,2263" id="eSc_textblock_e92bcae9" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="599,2893 590,2462 591,2461 1348,2461 1348,2889" id="eSc_textblock_6a6a772a" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2134,2884 1365,2889 1365,2461 2126,2461" id="eSc_textblock_f1136b4e" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="761,2944 761,3562 1956,3562 1956,2944" id="eSc_textblock_06a921c4" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="606,239 606,2256 2121,2248 2126,239" id="eSc_textblock_58ef96ea" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="1230,3278 1230,3547 1494,3547 1494,3278" id="eSc_textblock_cd3132d7" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
        </tei-surface>
    </tei-facsimile>
    <tei-text data-origname="text">
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_58ef96ea" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
            <tei-figure data-origname="figure">
                <tei-desc resp="#np" data-origname="desc" data-origatts="resp">
                    <tei-seg ana="#sitting_woman" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="ana">
                        Woman in a dress sitting a chair,
                    </tei-seg>
                    a man standing next to her. A grand piano.
                </tei-desc>
            </tei-figure>
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_e92bcae9" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-hi rendition="#k" class="k" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-quote type="testimonial" data-origname="quote" data-origatts="type">
                    <tei-seg ana="#exact_reproduction" type="topic" resp="#np" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="resp type ana">
                        "The realism of its playing is almost
                        <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>beyond belief
                    </tei-seg>
                    . . . that's why I bought it."
                </tei-quote>
            </tei-hi>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_6a6a772a" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-seg ana="#entertainment #hostess" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                It is with pardonable pride that the
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>hostess calls attention to her <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Mignon Licensee Reproducing Piano</tei-name>.
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-seg ana="#exact_reproduction" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Its playing is the faithfhul rendition
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>of the artist's work - there can be
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>no variation.
                <tei-seg ana="#personality" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                    All the personality,
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the character, the technique of the
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>great master is amazingly preserved.
                </tei-seg>
            </tei-seg>
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_f1136b4e" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Your piano merchant will be happy
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>to prove this to you. <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Licensee Reproducing Pianos</tei-name> are
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>offered by 115 leading piano man-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ufacturers. Send for our Book of
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Famous Artists.
            <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">
                The Auto Pneu-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>matic Action Co.
            </tei-orgName>,
            <tei-persName data-origname="persName">
                W. C. Heaton
            </tei-persName>,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>President,
            <tei-address data-origname="address">
                653
                W. 51st St., New York.
            </tei-address>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_06a921c4" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Licensee
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Reproducing Piano</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-hi rendition="#k" class="k" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-seg type="slogan" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type">
                    The Master's Fingers on Your Piano.
                </tei-seg>
            </tei-hi>

            <tei-figure type="logo" data-origname="figure" data-origatts="type">
                <tei-desc resp="#np" data-origname="desc" data-origatts="resp">
                    <tei-seg ana="#phantom_body" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                        Phantom Fingers.
                    </tei-seg>
                </tei-desc>
            </tei-figure>
        </tei-div>
    </tei-text>
</tei-TEI>
